Info.Description:
Title: FullOfficeProPlus2024Installation Configfile.
Description: Installs Full Office LTSC Pro Plus 2024 Suite, Activation done by Volume Licensing per public KMS-Servers.
Programs: 1. Office LTSC ProPlus 2024 2. Visio LTSC Pro 2024 3. Project Pro 2024
KMS-Servers: 1. kms-project.msguides.com 2. kms8.msguides.com 3. kms9.msguides.com 4. e8.us.to 5. e9.us.to
Activation Command:
Set KMS-Host: cscript ospp.vbs /sethst kms-project.msguides.com Activate Volume Licenses: cscript ospp.vbs /act Verify Volume Licenses are activated: cscript ospp.vbs /dstatusall
Activation Command Parameters: 1. /SetHST: Configure KMS Server Host URL 2. /Act: Activates Configfile-installed Licenses (Parameter could be passed optional Value: Licensekey) 3. /DStatus: Enables Printing the Output of the "cscript ospp.vbs" Command
